tool_description: This api provides you with several endpoints to get updated info about champions, items, factions and summoners of League of Legends
name: League of Legends LOL
title: League of Legends LOL

api_list.name: /lol/items
api_list.description: List of League of Leguends Items

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: it can be: en_US, fr_FR, es_AR, es_es, pt_br

api_list.name: /lol/summoners
api_list.description: List of Summoners of League of Leguenda

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: it can be: en_US, fr_FR, es_AR, es_es, pt_br

api_list.name: /lol/champions

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: it can be: en_US, fr_FR, es_AR, es_es, pt_br

api_list.name: /lol/factions
api_list.description: List of Factions of League of Leguends
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://perodriguezl-league-of-legends-v1.p.rapidapi.com/lol/factions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "perodriguezl-league-of-legends-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://perodriguezl-league-of-legends-v1.p.rapidapi.com/lol/factions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "perodriguezl-league-of-legends-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
